entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Cartwright
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:47 AM AST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 29.
